main.name: Rohit Ghumare
main.occupation: Software Engineer At Reverie Language Technologies
main.description: If you are looking for someone to help you with solutions in AIOps/MLOps, DevOps, Cloud, Machine Learning and Chatbot development domains, Count me in!
main.bio: My name is Rohit, I'm a DevOps Cloud Engineer. Currently I'm working at Reverie Language Technologies.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I have some skills, You might can have a look for once

work.title: Software Engineer - NLP
work.description: Working with Automated Speech Recognition team to develop efficient solutions for clients

work.title: DevOps Cloud Engineer
work.description: My Job as a DevOps Cloud Engineer is to deal with the entire Cloud Infrastructure system of my company. Whenever a new project is assigned, Worked on setting up the Live system on-premises and cloud-hosted both as per the company use-case. Worked on various AI Robots by building models and helping with integration for Robots with Amazon AWS and ROS software. As a Chatbot Developer, My job is to deal with chatbot development and deployment from scratch to advance using Dialogflow, voice-apps, rasa, python, and Django framework. Worked extensively to build various chatbots for clients from various industries.

work.title: Founder
work.description: Transforming the lives of people by helping them with Internships, Job and Trainings oppportunities at free of cost. Also teaching them how to become successful developers no matter if they are a beginner or not!

projects.title: Amazon EKS service to deploy WebApp
projects.category: Amazon EKS service to deploy WebApp

testimonials.text: Rohit is excellent with his skills in AWS cloud and Rasa Chatbot development, He has helped our clients in various projects in Machine Learning and Cloud domains.

Rohit Ghumare is very helpful and down to earth guy. I have talked him on LinkedIn and he is always ready to help . and helped me a lot ,you can get knowledge about many technologies and he is very good in conversations too.

Rohit is very hardworking guy. He has great leadership and communication skills and has done lots of non-profit groups for students without asking a single penny. In this covid-19 crisis, Rohit worked hard on his skills and got two jobs in hand. He motivated many students like me and showed us how to not give up and keep hustling.
